artist: Artist: Jim Dine; Publisher: Enitharmon Press, London
description: dark blue slipcase containing hardcover book and one loose print; book is dark blue with 'KALI' embossed in gold lettering across top; book contains a combination of prints alternating with poems; loose print in paper folder, with image of loosely sketched face with round wire rim glasses; bound volume; lender's archive #228

medium: Etchings; letterpress, with denim-covered cover; bound volume

signed: Signed in pencil on introductory page: Jim Dine
title: Kali: Poems and Etchings
